ygData.subject: Re:That darn goblin alchemist.
ygData.msgSnippet: 1st point: The alchemist in misty spawns at teh goblin camp closest to the running eye zone.  ordinarily there are 2 goblins at this camp, but ever hour and a
ygData.messageBody:
1st point:
The alchemist in misty spawns at teh goblin camp closest to the running eye
zone. ordinarily there are 2 goblins at this camp, but ever hour and a half or
so a 3rd goblibn pops - either Mooto or the alchemist. Mooto and the alchemist
are the only ones you need to kill. But somepeople kill the other two to pass
the time.

NOTE: this is the easier of the two alchemists to get. The one in the gorge is
*VERY* rare. If I were you I would take advantage of the server reset and head
to the GOrge as soon as you wake up! The misty thicket alchemist will pop about
once every 2-4 hours. The one in the gorge is rumored to be a once a week
guy....






____________________Reply Separator____________________
Subject: [EQ-Monks] That darn goblin alchemist.
Author: "RaceFace" <bean@...>
Date: 02/17/2000 10:06 AM

From: "RaceFace" <bean@...>

Started.. or at least tried to start.. the Treant Fists quest last night.

It's 10:04AM central... I haven't gone to bed yet. Spent from 1:15am until
just now slaughtering goblins in Misty Thicket trying to get the damn
alchemist to spawn. No luck. Even petitioned just before the servers were
going to come down to see if they could make him spawn for me. No dice. :)

Ah well... I hope my next attempt later today won't last as long as this one
did. I'm exhausted.

Hopefully the servers will be up when I wake up.

- Raean Bloodyhands, 26th monk, Tunare.
